metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5885 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Matrix Synapse before 0.34.0.1, when the macaroon_secret_key authenticationparameter is not set, uses a predictable value to derive a secret key andother secrets which could allow remote attackers to impersonate users.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.34.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.34.1.1-1').
